notes:
Obujos, Defensor Profundis, is one of the three depth lords. Reachable in third stage of [[Liquid Black Quest]]. He is the second strongest [[Deeplings|deepling]] boss.
{{Seealso|Obujos/Treasure Statistics}}
name: Obujos
behaviour: He walks on all kinds of fields, he has strong ice beam/wave.
strategy: Trap him in narrow path in south part of his arena and block him with [[Wild Growth]] to avoid retarget. Don't let him walk around, because he may recover his health quickly. [[Bronze Amulet]] is highly recommended as Obujos does mana drain attack about every second turn. Druids should use their strongest ice spells because this boss is weak on ice.
